metadata.title: CVE-2024-41043 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nfnetlink_queue: drop bogus WARN_ONHappens when rules get flushed/deleted while packet is out, so removethis WARN_ON.This WARN exists in one form or another since v4.14, no need to backportthis to older releases, hence use a more recent fixes tag.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
